title: Mandrill
description: Mandrill is a reliable, scalable, and secure delivery API for transactional emails from websites and applications. It's ideal for sending data-driven transactional emails, including targeted e-commerce and personalized one-to-one messages.

post_exports_activity_json.title: Begins an export of your activity history. The activity will be exported to a zip archive containing a single file named activity.csv in the same format as you would be able to export from your account's activity view. It includes the following fields: Date, Email Address, Sender, Subject, Status, Tags, Opens, Clicks, Bounce Detail. If you have configured any custom metadata fields, they will be included in the exported data.
post_exports_activity_json.description: Begins an export of your activity history. The activity will be exported to a zip archive containing a single file named activity.csv in the same format as you would be able to export from your account's activity view. It includes the following fields: Date, Email Address, Sender, Subject, Status, Tags, Opens, Clicks, Bounce Detail. If you have configured any custom metadata fields, they will be included in the exported data.

post_exports_info_json.title: Returns information about an export job. If the export job's state is 'complete', the returned data will include a URL you can use to fetch the results. Every export job produces a zip archive, but the format of the archive is distinct for each job type. The api calls that initiate exports include more details about the output format for that job type.
post_exports_info_json.description: Returns information about an export job. If the export job's state is 'complete', the returned data will include a URL you can use to fetch the results. Every export job produces a zip archive, but the format of the archive is distinct for each job type. The api calls that initiate exports include more details about the output format for that job type.

post_exports_list_json.title: Returns a list of your exports.
post_exports_list_json.description: Returns a list of your exports.

post_exports_rejects_json.title: Begins an export of your rejection blacklist. The blacklist will be exported to a zip archive containing a single file named rejects.csv that includes the following fields: email, reason, detail, created_at, expires_at, last_event_at, expires_at.
post_exports_rejects_json.description: Begins an export of your rejection blacklist. The blacklist will be exported to a zip archive containing a single file named rejects.csv that includes the following fields: email, reason, detail, created_at, expires_at, last_event_at, expires_at.

post_exports_whitelist_json.title: Begins an export of your rejection whitelist. The whitelist will be exported to a zip archive containing a single file named whitelist.csv that includes the following fields: email, detail, created_at.
post_exports_whitelist_json.description: Begins an export of your rejection whitelist. The whitelist will be exported to a zip archive containing a single file named whitelist.csv that includes the following fields: email, detail, created_at.

post_inbound_add_domain_json.title: Add an inbound domain to your account
post_inbound_add_domain_json.description: Add an inbound domain to your account

post_inbound_add_route_json.title: Add a new mailbox route to an inbound domain
post_inbound_add_route_json.description: Add a new mailbox route to an inbound domain

post_inbound_check_domain_json.title: Check the MX settings for an inbound domain. The domain must have already been added with the add-domain call
post_inbound_check_domain_json.description: Check the MX settings for an inbound domain. The domain must have already been added with the add-domain call

post_inbound_delete_domain_json.title: Delete an inbound domain from the account. All mail will stop routing for this domain immediately.
post_inbound_delete_domain_json.description: Delete an inbound domain from the account. All mail will stop routing for this domain immediately.

post_inbound_delete_route_json.title: Delete an existing inbound mailbox route
post_inbound_delete_route_json.description: Delete an existing inbound mailbox route

post_inbound_domains_json.title: List the domains that have been configured for inbound delivery
post_inbound_domains_json.description: List the domains that have been configured for inbound delivery

post_inbound_routes_json.title: List the mailbox routes defined for an inbound domain
post_inbound_routes_json.description: List the mailbox routes defined for an inbound domain

post_inbound_send_raw_json.title: Take a raw MIME document destined for a domain with inbound domains set up, and send it to the inbound hook exactly as if it had been sent over SMTP
post_inbound_send_raw_json.description: Take a raw MIME document destined for a domain with inbound domains set up, and send it to the inbound hook exactly as if it had been sent over SMTP

post_inbound_update_route_json.title: Update the pattern or webhook of an existing inbound mailbox route. If null is provided for any fields, the values will remain unchanged.
post_inbound_update_route_json.description: Update the pattern or webhook of an existing inbound mailbox route. If null is provided for any fields, the values will remain unchanged.

post_ips_cancel_warmup_json.title: Cancels the warmup process for a dedicated IP.
post_ips_cancel_warmup_json.description: Cancels the warmup process for a dedicated IP.

post_ips_check_custom_dns_json.title: Tests whether a domain name is valid for use as the custom reverse DNS for a dedicated IP.
post_ips_check_custom_dns_json.description: Tests whether a domain name is valid for use as the custom reverse DNS for a dedicated IP.

post_ips_create_pool_json.title: Creates a pool and returns it. If a pool already exists with this name, no action will be performed.
post_ips_create_pool_json.description: Creates a pool and returns it. If a pool already exists with this name, no action will be performed.

post_ips_delete_pool_json.title: Deletes a pool. A pool must be empty before you can delete it, and you cannot delete your default pool.
post_ips_delete_pool_json.description: Deletes a pool. A pool must be empty before you can delete it, and you cannot delete your default pool.

post_ips_delete_json.title: Deletes a dedicated IP. This is permanent and cannot be undone.
post_ips_delete_json.description: Deletes a dedicated IP. This is permanent and cannot be undone.

post_ips_info_json.title: Retrieves information about a single dedicated ip.
post_ips_info_json.description: Retrieves information about a single dedicated ip.

post_ips_pool_info_json.title: Describes a single dedicated IP pool.
post_ips_pool_info_json.description: Describes a single dedicated IP pool.

post_ips_provision_json.title: Requests an additional dedicated IP for your account. Accounts may have one outstanding request at any time, and provisioning requests are processed within 24 hours.
post_ips_provision_json.description: Requests an additional dedicated IP for your account. Accounts may have one outstanding request at any time, and provisioning requests are processed within 24 hours.

post_ips_set_custom_dns_json.title: Configures the custom DNS name for a dedicated IP.
post_ips_set_custom_dns_json.description: Configures the custom DNS name for a dedicated IP.

post_ips_set_pool_json.title: Moves a dedicated IP to a different pool.
post_ips_set_pool_json.description: Moves a dedicated IP to a different pool.

post_ips_start_warmup_json.title: Begins the warmup process for a dedicated IP. During the warmup process, Mandrill will gradually increase the percentage of your mail that is sent over the warming-up IP, over a period of roughly 30 days. The rest of your mail will be sent over shared IPs or other dedicated IPs in the same pool.
post_ips_start_warmup_json.description: Begins the warmup process for a dedicated IP. During the warmup process, Mandrill will gradually increase the percentage of your mail that is sent over the warming-up IP, over a period of roughly 30 days. The rest of your mail will be sent over shared IPs or other dedicated IPs in the same pool.

post_messages_content_json.title: Get the full content of a recently sent message
post_messages_content_json.description: Get the full content of a recently sent message

post_messages_info_json.title: Get the information for a single recently sent message
post_messages_info_json.description: Get the information for a single recently sent message

post_messages_list_scheduled_json.title: Queries your scheduled emails by sender or recipient, or both.
post_messages_list_scheduled_json.description: Queries your scheduled emails by sender or recipient, or both.

post_messages_parse_json.title: Parse the full MIME document for an email message, returning the content of the message broken into its constituent pieces
post_messages_parse_json.description: Parse the full MIME document for an email message, returning the content of the message broken into its constituent pieces

post_messages_search_time_series_json.title: Search the content of recently sent messages and return the aggregated hourly stats for matching messages
post_messages_search_time_series_json.description: Search the content of recently sent messages and return the aggregated hourly stats for matching messages

post_messages_search_json.title: Search the content of recently sent messages and optionally narrow by date range, tags and senders. This method may be called up to 20 times per minute. If you need the data more often, you can use /messages/info.json to get the information for a single message, or webhooks to push activity to your own application for querying.
post_messages_search_json.description: Search the content of recently sent messages and optionally narrow by date range, tags and senders. This method may be called up to 20 times per minute. If you need the data more often, you can use /messages/info.json to get the information for a single message, or webhooks to push activity to your own application for querying.

post_messages_send_raw_json.title: Take a raw MIME document for a message, and send it exactly as if it were sent through Mandrill's SMTP servers
post_messages_send_raw_json.description: Take a raw MIME document for a message, and send it exactly as if it were sent through Mandrill's SMTP servers

post_messages_send_template_json.title: Send a new transactional message through Mandrill using a template
post_messages_send_template_json.description: Send a new transactional message through Mandrill using a template

post_messages_send_json.title: Send a new transactional message through Mandrill
post_messages_send_json.description: Send a new transactional message through Mandrill

post_metadata_add_json.title: Add a new custom metadata field to be indexed for the account.
post_metadata_add_json.description: Add a new custom metadata field to be indexed for the account.

post_metadata_delete_json.title: Delete an existing custom metadata field. Deletion isn't instataneous, and /metadata/list will continue to return the field until the asynchronous deletion process is complete.
post_metadata_delete_json.description: Delete an existing custom metadata field. Deletion isn't instataneous, and /metadata/list will continue to return the field until the asynchronous deletion process is complete.

post_metadata_list_json.title: Get the list of custom metadata fields indexed for the account.
post_metadata_list_json.description: Get the list of custom metadata fields indexed for the account.

post_metadata_update_json.title: Update an existing custom metadata field.
post_metadata_update_json.description: Update an existing custom metadata field.

post_rejects_add_json.title: Adds an email to your email rejection blacklist. Addresses that you add manually will never expire and there is no reputation penalty for removing them from your blacklist. Attempting to blacklist an address that has been whitelisted will have no effect.
post_rejects_add_json.description: Adds an email to your email rejection blacklist. Addresses that you add manually will never expire and there is no reputation penalty for removing them from your blacklist. Attempting to blacklist an address that has been whitelisted will have no effect.

post_rejects_delete_json.title: Deletes an email rejection. There is no limit to how many rejections you can remove from your blacklist, but keep in mind that each deletion has an affect on your reputation.
post_rejects_delete_json.description: Deletes an email rejection. There is no limit to how many rejections you can remove from your blacklist, but keep in mind that each deletion has an affect on your reputation.

post_rejects_list_json.title: Retrieves your email rejection blacklist. You can provide an email address to limit the results. Returns up to 1000 results. By default, entries that have expired are excluded from the results; set include_expired to true to include them.
post_rejects_list_json.description: Retrieves your email rejection blacklist. You can provide an email address to limit the results. Returns up to 1000 results. By default, entries that have expired are excluded from the results; set include_expired to true to include them.

post_senders_add_domain_json.title: Adds a sender domain to your account. Sender domains are added automatically as you send, but you can use this call to add them ahead of time.
post_senders_add_domain_json.description: Adds a sender domain to your account. Sender domains are added automatically as you send, but you can use this call to add them ahead of time.

post_senders_check_domain_json.title: Checks the SPF and DKIM settings for a domain. If you haven't already added this domain to your account, it will be added automatically.
post_senders_check_domain_json.description: Checks the SPF and DKIM settings for a domain. If you haven't already added this domain to your account, it will be added automatically.

post_senders_domains_json.title: Returns the sender domains that have been added to this account.
post_senders_domains_json.description: Returns the sender domains that have been added to this account.

post_senders_info_json.title: Return more detailed information about a single sender, including aggregates of recent stats
post_senders_info_json.description: Return more detailed information about a single sender, including aggregates of recent stats

post_senders_list_json.title: Return the senders that have tried to use this account.
post_senders_list_json.description: Return the senders that have tried to use this account.

post_senders_time_series_json.title: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for a sender
post_senders_time_series_json.description: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for a sender

post_senders_verify_domain_json.title: Sends a verification email in order to verify ownership of a domain. Domain verification is an optional step to confirm ownership of a domain. Once a domain has been verified in a Mandrill account, other accounts may not have their messages signed by that domain unless they also verify the domain. This prevents other Mandrill accounts from sending mail signed by your domain.
post_senders_verify_domain_json.description: Sends a verification email in order to verify ownership of a domain. Domain verification is an optional step to confirm ownership of a domain. Once a domain has been verified in a Mandrill account, other accounts may not have their messages signed by that domain unless they also verify the domain. This prevents other Mandrill accounts from sending mail signed by your domain.

post_subaccounts_delete_json.title: Delete an existing subaccount. Any email related to the subaccount will be saved, but stats will be removed and any future sending calls to this subaccount will fail.
post_subaccounts_delete_json.description: Delete an existing subaccount. Any email related to the subaccount will be saved, but stats will be removed and any future sending calls to this subaccount will fail.

post_subaccounts_info_json.title: Given the ID of an existing subaccount, return the data about it
post_subaccounts_info_json.description: Given the ID of an existing subaccount, return the data about it

post_subaccounts_list_json.title: Get the list of subaccounts defined for the account, optionally filtered by a prefix
post_subaccounts_list_json.description: Get the list of subaccounts defined for the account, optionally filtered by a prefix

post_subaccounts_pause_json.title: Pause a subaccount's sending. Any future emails delivered to this subaccount will be queued for a maximum of 3 days until the subaccount is resumed.
post_subaccounts_pause_json.description: Pause a subaccount's sending. Any future emails delivered to this subaccount will be queued for a maximum of 3 days until the subaccount is resumed.

post_tags_all_time_series_json.title: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for all tags
post_tags_all_time_series_json.description: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for all tags

post_tags_delete_json.title: Deletes a tag permanently. Deleting a tag removes the tag from any messages that have been sent, and also deletes the tag's stats. There is no way to undo this operation, so use it carefully.
post_tags_delete_json.description: Deletes a tag permanently. Deleting a tag removes the tag from any messages that have been sent, and also deletes the tag's stats. There is no way to undo this operation, so use it carefully.

post_tags_info_json.title: Return more detailed information about a single tag, including aggregates of recent stats
post_tags_info_json.description: Return more detailed information about a single tag, including aggregates of recent stats

post_tags_list_json.title: Return all of the user-defined tag information
post_tags_list_json.description: Return all of the user-defined tag information

post_tags_time_series_json.title: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for a tag
post_tags_time_series_json.description: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for a tag

post_templates_info_json.title: Get the information for an existing template
post_templates_info_json.description: Get the information for an existing template

post_templates_list_json.title: Return a list of all the templates available to this user
post_templates_list_json.description: Return a list of all the templates available to this user

post_templates_publish_json.title: Publish the content for the template. Any new messages sent using this template will start using the content that was previously in draft.
post_templates_publish_json.description: Publish the content for the template. Any new messages sent using this template will start using the content that was previously in draft.

post_templates_render_json.title: Inject content and optionally merge fields into a template, returning the HTML that results
post_templates_render_json.description: Inject content and optionally merge fields into a template, returning the HTML that results

post_templates_time_series_json.title: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for a template
post_templates_time_series_json.description: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for a template

post_templates_update_json.title: Update the code for an existing template. If null is provided for any fields, the values will remain unchanged.
post_templates_update_json.description: Update the code for an existing template. If null is provided for any fields, the values will remain unchanged.

post_urls_add_tracking_domain_json.title: Add a tracking domain to your account
post_urls_add_tracking_domain_json.description: Add a tracking domain to your account

post_urls_check_tracking_domain_json.title: Checks the CNAME settings for a tracking domain. The domain must have been added already with the add-tracking-domain call
post_urls_check_tracking_domain_json.description: Checks the CNAME settings for a tracking domain. The domain must have been added already with the add-tracking-domain call

post_urls_search_json.title: Return the 100 most clicked URLs that match the search query given
post_urls_search_json.description: Return the 100 most clicked URLs that match the search query given

post_urls_time_series_json.title: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for a url
post_urls_time_series_json.description: Return the recent history (hourly stats for the last 30 days) for a url

post_urls_tracking_domains_json.title: Get the list of tracking domains set up for this account
post_urls_tracking_domains_json.description: Get the list of tracking domains set up for this account

post_users_info_json.title: Return the information about the API-connected user
post_users_info_json.description: Return the information about the API-connected user

post_users_ping_json.title: Validate an API key and respond to a ping
post_users_ping_json.description: Validate an API key and respond to a ping

post_users_ping2_json.title: Validate an API key and respond to a ping (anal JSON parser version)
post_users_ping2_json.description: Validate an API key and respond to a ping (anal JSON parser version)

post_users_senders_json.title: Return the senders that have tried to use this account, both verified and unverified
post_users_senders_json.description: Return the senders that have tried to use this account, both verified and unverified

post_webhooks_info_json.title: Given the ID of an existing webhook, return the data about it
post_webhooks_info_json.description: Given the ID of an existing webhook, return the data about it

post_webhooks_list_json.title: Get the list of all webhooks defined on the account
post_webhooks_list_json.description: Get the list of all webhooks defined on the account

post_whitelists_add_json.title: Adds an email to your email rejection whitelist. If the address is currently on your blacklist, that blacklist entry will be removed automatically.
post_whitelists_add_json.description: Adds an email to your email rejection whitelist. If the address is currently on your blacklist, that blacklist entry will be removed automatically.

post_whitelists_delete_json.title: Removes an email address from the whitelist.
post_whitelists_delete_json.description: Removes an email address from the whitelist.

post_whitelists_list_json.title: Retrieves your email rejection whitelist. You can provide an email address or search prefix to limit the results. Returns up to 1000 results.
post_whitelists_list_json.description: Retrieves your email rejection whitelist. You can provide an email address or search prefix to limit the results. Returns up to 1000 results.
